title: Discipline
description: Engineering specialization that defines T-shaped skill profiles

specialization.description: Name of the specialization (e.g., Software Engineering)

isProfessional.description: If true, this is an IC/professional discipline (default true)

isManagement.description: If true, this is a management discipline (default false)

validTracks.description: REQUIRED. Explicit list of valid tracks. Use null to allow trackless (generalist). Empty array = no valid combinations.

minLevel.description: Minimum level required for this discipline

coreSkills.description: Primary skills for deep expertise (references skill IDs)

supportingSkills.description: Secondary skills for supporting capabilities (references skill IDs)

broadSkills.description: Skills for general awareness (references skill IDs)

behaviourModifiers.description: Modifiers to behaviour expectations (behaviour ID â†’ modifier)

professionalRoleSummary.description: Role summary for professional/IC track. May use {roleTitle} placeholder.

managementRoleSummary.description: Role summary for management track. May use {specialization} placeholder.

identity.description: Core identity statement for the agent. May use {roleTitle} or {roleName} placeholder.

constraints.description: Things the agent should avoid or never do
